name: project
description: Manage and configure a project. This command only works in your project channel(s).

options.name: name
options.description: Change the name of your project channel.

options.name: value
options.description: The new name for your project channel.

options.name: description
options.description: Change or remove the description of your project channel.

options.name: value
options.description: The new description for your project channel.

options.name: banner
options.description: Set or remove the image that can be used as the server banner.

options.name: set
options.description: Set the image that can be used as the server banner.

options.name: url
options.description: The URL pointing to the image.

options.name: label
options.description: Add a label to the image.

options.name: label_text
options.description: The text of the added label, if enabled. Defaults to the channel name.

options.name: remove
options.description: Remove the image that can be used as the server banner.

options.name: mute
options.description: Mute a user in your project channel.

options.name: user
options.description: The user you want to mute.

options.name: unmute
options.description: Unmute a user in your project channel.

options.name: user
options.description: The user you want to unmute.

options.name: ping
options.description: Ping all users that are subscribed to this project.

options.name: webhook
options.description: Set up webhooks for your project and (re)generate a secret key for signing them.
